Articles.Content:
I've been playing KSP for a long time but i only just joined the forums. (i bought KSP when it was like 5 dollars) i've got to the mun, minmus, duna and i'm orbiting Jool at the moment. im making some challenges if anyone wants to see them follow this link for my second challenge campaign

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39608-Saving-Astronaut-Jebediah

Welcome to the community unitetoons1

You've played since KSP was $5? wow that was ages ago, what do you think of how the game has progressed?

Edited July 9, 2013 by sal_vager
Spelling

it has progressed massively. god i remember the original vehicle assembly building structure! the parts were laid out very differently! the mechanics are very different aswell but that hasnt really changed the feel. i hope that the game will continue to progress at this rate

Well it may slow down as the game gets larger, it becomes harder to make big changes when the game is already so large.

But we'll see how it goes, KSP's already my most played game and that's after over a year playing it
I started at 0.13.2, so never saw the palm trees and stuff except in other peoples pics, I had tons of fun landing on the Mun with wings for legs though
Welcome to the forums! I think I started playing just after they added the mun. It's amazing just how much more there is to explore.
in the original was there no other celestial bodies then... that must have been a little bit boring
No where to go? wow, what were you suposed to do?
kerbal space program is in my top 3 best games I joined the forums yesterday and look at how many posts I have and ive played ksp for 2 weeks and im about to land on the mun I <3 KSP
id just be like OH MY GOD IM IN ORBIT.....well this is fun
